summary: A re-texture of the Miner's Clothes I made for personal use. A baby blue, floral shirt that is more formal than the Miner's Clothes, but still thoroughly proletarian.
descriptionHtml:
This is standalone, half-arsed and [u]male only[/u].

I made it for my own use and I have uploaded it here because I may be unable to access the file offline once I replace my computer. I had planned on releasing a full package of a more diverse selection of recolours (for both male and female characters) and that is still on the table, but for now, this is all I got!

The tunic is classed as Light Armor. I haven't placed it anywhere in the world, but if you are comfortable using CHIM (console commands!!), you can add the tunic to your inventory by searching "worker" via the console menu. It should be listed under "armo:" as something like "xx000d52" (with "xx" being the number the mod is listed as in your load order).

If you would like to download it yourself, it should work fine (assuming I have packed it right!) and sit around where other armour mods are in your load order. If you have any problems I will try to assist while I still have the means to do so.

Workers of Tamriel unite! \o/
author: Rob_the_Bob
